title: Netflix film Fractured leaves viewers shocked: "My jaw is still on the floor"
text:

Netflix fans have been left shaken by a new film on the streaming service.

Fractured follows Ray Monroe (Sam Worthington), a well-meaning but overwhelmed family man driving home from a holiday with the in-laws, who then pulls into a rest area with his wife Joanne (Lily Rabe) and daughter Peri (Lucy Capri).

However, events take a turn for the worse when Peri is hurt in an accident and the family rushes to a nearby emergency room run.

Once in the hospital, Ray soon discovers that his wife and daughter have vanished after leaving for medical tests in the hospital, and he becomes desperate to discover what happened to his family and what dubious intentions the staff have,

The twists and turns led to shocking finale, and viewers have taken to Twitter to express their shock over what goes down in Netflix film Fractured.

(Image: Eric Zachanowich/Netflix)

One viewer wrote: "Oh. My. Lord. Just finished watching Fractured on Netflix. You think you know what is happening, then it flips, then it flips again, then it twists and flips back again. My jaw just dropped at the end."

Another said: "Watched Fractured on Netflix last night. Very spooked by it."

One user concurred: "Just watched Fractured on Netflix and my jaw is still on the floor at that ending, kept guessing what was actually happening all the way through but did not predict that a 10/10 film"

(Image: Eric Zachanowich/Netflix)

Meanwhile, another user was full of praise: "Fractured is such a banging film well done Netflix"

Finally, one concluded: Holy f***ing shit!!!! #Fractured on @netflix was so intense, so mind f***ing, so jaw dropping, that it truly is one of the best films I’ve seen on Netflix!!! Incredible job by #SamWorthingtonWow....just wow! #fracturednetflix #WatchThis "

Well, sounds like it needs to be seen to be believed.

Fractured is available now on Netflix.

Have you seen Fractured? Let us know what you think in the comments below.
description: Sam Worthington and Lily Rabe star in the Netflix thriller Fractured - and fans have been shaken by the film
